head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DE CASTELLA, JEAN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DE CASTELLA, JEAN

block.p: de CASTELLA-Jean. The Bard College community mourns the passing of Jean de Castella, a longtime friend, neighbor, and former trustee, whose support of the college and its programs will leave a lasting mark. He will be sorely missed. We extend our deepest condolences to his family. Leon Botstein, President David E. Schwab II, Chairman

de CASTELLA-Jean.
